parameters.prompt: dream-pop, melancholic, nostalgic, electric piano, soft percussion, reverb-drenched
parameters.lyrics: [verse] The streetlights hum a lullaby / Asphalt still warm from the day / Your shadow lingers by the door / But youre already miles away [chorus] Static in the telephone / Fading like a radio glow / I dial your number in the dark / But the lines been dead for years, I know [verse] Polaroids curl at the edge / Smiles frozen under glass / The future we sketched in pencil / Just a ghost of the past [chorus] Static in the telephone / Fading like a radio glow / I dial your number in the dark / But the lines been dead for years, I know [bridge] Maybe in some parallel world / Were still eating breakfast at noon / Our laughter spilling through the screen door / To a tune we forgot too soon [outro] The answering machine finally sleeps / Just the hiss of an empty room / And the echo of your voice / Still caught in the wires of the moon
